name: utils-core.js
description: "CoreUtils is a powerful JavaScript utility library that provides a wide range of functions to simplify common programming tasks. From formatting data and working with arrays and objects to handling errors and randomizing data, CoreUtils offers a comprehensive set of tools that can help streamline your development process. Whether you're building a web application, mobile app, or any other project, CoreUtils can save you time and effort by providing reliable and efficient solutions. With its user-friendly API and extensive documentation, CoreUtils is an essential tool for any developer looking to improve their workflow and produce high-quality code
author: sif_mst
